DOC.brief_summary: The purpose OHA PILI 'Ohana Project disseminate evaluate effectiveness community-based intervention ( PILI 'Ohana Intervention Program ) aim eliminate obesity Pacific Peoples across four island . Dissemination involve implementation program eight community partnerships nine different community-based organization serve area ( four found community partner five new community partner ) . These organization provide service large number Pacific Peoples , include ( limited ) Native Hawaiians , Samoans , Filipinos , Chuukese . The main aim : ( 1 ) train five additional community organization staff deliver PILI 'Ohana Intervention Program , ( 2 ) enroll 150 overweight/obese participant across 8 different community four different island intervention program , ( 3 ) evaluate effectiveness program reduce weight/BMI least 3 % participant 's initial weight . The PILI 'Ohana Intervention 9-month lifestyle intervention focus individual health behavior context family community environments socio-cultural context Pacific Peoples . In order increase likelihood organization implement PLP , able adapt intervention participant assessment . The POP provide guidance adaption intervention assessment train ( CHS # 21680 ) . What describe maximum amount contact assessment procedures participant undergo . Therefore , organization may change time 14 lesson refrain use assessment procedure , still provide 14 lesson offer incentives participant assessment .
DOC.brief_title: Partnerships Improve Lifestyle Interventions ( PILI ) 'Ohana Dissemination Project
DOC.criteria: BMI great equal 25 Clients and/or resident community serve 9 partner community organization
